law.catch_line: Restriction on former legislator becoming a legislative agent -- Prohibition against legislator being a legislative agent -- Penalty.

text.section: A former legislator shall not be a legislative agent, other than for a public agency, until after two (2) years have elapsed since the date the legislator left office.
A legislator shall not be a legislative agent.
Violation of this section is ethical misconduct.

law.history: Created 1993 (1st Extra. Sess.) Ky. Acts ch. 4, sec. 14, effective September 16, 1993.
